content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"English version\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1. 5. With Whom the Employee's Personal Information is Disclosed\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM may transfer your personal information, including any special categories of personal information as necessary, to third parties for the processing purposes set out in section 1.3 as follows:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Within the EPAM Group of Companies:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" As part of our global structure, employee managers or certain regional or global departments may be located at other EPAM group of companies. Therefore, our parent entity in the United States and other EPAM entities within the global EPAM group of companies may receive your personal information such as in order to administer the workforce, monitor and ensure compliance with applicable EPAM procedures, and respond to and comply with requests and legal demands. In order to provide adequate protection for such personal information transfers, EPAM implements organizational and technical security measures and data transfers agreements including those based on the EU standard contractual clauses and similar forms deemed adequate by the European Commission and relevant authorities\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"With certain third parties: \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Existing or potential business partners, suppliers, independent external advisors (e.g., auditors), banks, insurance carriers, benefits providers, and other third parties may also receive your personal information as necessary in connection with our business operations, in particular to carry out our contractual relationships with such third parties, to administer and provide compensation, administer and provide applicable benefits and other work-related allowances, administer the workforce, comply with applicable laws and employment-related requirements, communicate with employees and third parties, to comply with corporate financial responsibilities, and respond to and comply with requests and legal demands. If you work on customer projects, we may provide the customer with a description of your experience or a copy of your resume, with or without your name, but after removing your personal contact information. Once you have been provisionally selected for a client project and before you can start on the project, there may be a requirement for you to undergo background checks which may be carried out by us, the customer or a third party, or for us to confirm to the customer that you have successfully passed any required background checks, always subject to applicable law.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"With certain acquiring or acquired entities:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" If the EPAM company for which you  work is sold or transferred in whole or in part or if EPAM is acquiring and integrating another entity into the EPAM company for which you work (or any similar transaction is being contemplated), your personal information may be transferred to the other entity (e.g., the new employer, potential new employer, the new acquired entity, or potential new acquired entity) prior to the transaction (e.g., during the diligence phase) or after the transaction, subject to any rights provided by applicable law, including jurisdictions where the other entity is located.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"With personal information processors:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Certain third parties, whether affiliated or unaffiliated, may receive your personal information to process such information under appropriate instructions (\\\"Data Processors\\\") as necessary to support and facilitate the processing purposes, such as third party insurance and benefits providers. The Data Processors will be subject to contractual obligations to implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to safeguard your personal information, and to process your personal information only as instructed and to provide adequate protection to personal information transfers.  \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Croatian version\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1.5. Kome se otkrivaju osobni podaci zaposlenika\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM može prenijeti Vaše osobne podatke, uključujući bilo koje posebne kategorije osobnih podataka kada je to potrebno, trećim stranama u svrhu obrade utvrđene u odjeljku 1.3., kako slijedi:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Unutar društava EPAM grupe: \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Kao dio naše globalne strukture, nadređene osobe radniku ili određeni regionalni ili globalni odjeli mogu se nalaziti u drugom društvu EPAM grupe. Stoga naše matično društvo u Sjedinjenim Državama i druga EPAM društva mogu unutar globalne EPAM grupe društava primiti Vaše osobne podatke, na primjer radi administriranja radnom snagom, praćenja i osiguranja poštivanja primjenjivih EPAM postupaka te odgovaranja i poštivanja zahtjeva i zakonskih obveza. Kako bi pružio odgovarajuću zaštitu za takav prijenos osobnih podataka, EPAM provodi organizacijske i tehničke sigurnosne mjere i sporazume o prijenosu podataka, uključujući one koji se temelje na standardnim ugovornim klauzulama EU-a i sličnim obrascima koje Europska komisija i nadležna tijela smatraju primjerenima.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"S određenim trećim stranama: \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Postojeći ili potencijalni poslovni partneri, dobavljači, neovisni vanjski savjetnici (npr. revizori), banke, pružatelji osiguranja, davatelji pogodnosti i druge treće strane mogu također dobiti Vaše osobne podatke po potrebi u vezi s našim poslovanjem, posebice za provođenje naših ugovornih odnosa s takvim trećim stranama, za upravljanje i osiguravanje naknada, upravljanje i pružanje primjenjivih pogodnosti i drugih naknada povezanih s radom, upravljanje radnom snagom, poštivanje važećih zakona i zahtjeva u vezi s zapošljavanjem, komunikaciju sa zaposlenicima i trećim stranama, radi poštivanja financijskih odgovornosti društva te odgovaranja i poštivanja zahtjeva i zakonskih obveza. Ako radite na projektima vezanim uz kupce, možemo kupcu pružiti opis Vašeg iskustva ili kopiju Vašeg životopisa, s Vašim imenom ili bez njega, ali nakon uklanjanja Vaših osobnih podataka za kontakt. Nakon što ste privremeno odabrani za projekt s kupcem i prije nego što započnete s projektom, možda ćete morati proći pozadinske provjere koje možemo provesti mi, kupac ili treća strana, ili kako bismo mi potvrdili kupcu da ste uspješno prošli sve potrebne pozadinske provjere, a kako je dopustivo primjenjivim propisima.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"S određenim stjecateljima ili stečenim društvima:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Ako se društvo EPAM za koje radite prodaje ili prenosi u cijelosti ili djelomično ili ako EPAM stječe i integrira drugo društvo u društvo EPAM za koje radite (ili se planira bilo koja slična transakcija), Vaši osobni podaci mogu se prenijeti drugom entitetu (npr. novom poslodavcu, potencijalnom novom poslodavcu, novom stečenom entitetu ili potencijalno novom stečenom entitetu) prije transakcije (npr. tijekom faze analize) ili nakon transakcije, podložno svim pravima predviđenim mjerodavnim pravom, uključujući jurisdikcije u kojima se nalazi drugo društvo.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"S izvršiteljima obrade osobnih podataka:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Određene treće strane, bilo povezane ili nepovezane, mogu dobiti Vaše osobne podatke za obradu takvih podataka u skladu s odgovarajućim uputama (\\\"Izvršitelji obrade\\\") po potrebi za potporu i olakšavanje svrhe obrade, poput trećih strana kao što su osiguravatelji i pružatelji pogodnosti. Izvršitelji obrade bit će podložni ugovornim obvezama za provedbu odgovarajućih tehničkih i organizacijskih sigurnosnih mjera radi zaštite Vaših osobnih podataka i vršit će obradu Vaših osobnih podataka samo prema uputama te će pružati odgovarajuću zaštitu za prijenos osobnih podataka.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]}}"
